creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
dimension:
10 × 14 1/2 in. (25.4 × 36.8 cm) (image, sheet, horizontal ōban)
14 x 17 15/16 in. (35.5 x 45.5 cm) (mat)
inscription: Kasasagi no/ wataseru hashi ni/ oku shimo no/ shiroki o mireba/ yo zo fukinikeri
markings: censor seal: kiwame 極; publisher's seal: Eijudō 永寿堂
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: One Hundred Poems Explained by the Nurse (Hyakunin isshu uba ga etoki 百人一首うはか縁説)
signed: Saki no Hokusai Manji 前北斎卍
title: Poem by Chūnagon Yakamochi
